assignments.description: This assignment element stores the triggering record and product into record variables.
assignments.name: Assign_to_variable
assignments.label: Assign to variable

decisions.name: Bpay_ID_Email_Subflows
decisions.label: Bpay & ID Email Subflows

rules.name: Send_CSF_Nominee_ID_NOT_Verified_Email
rules.label: Send CSF Nominee ID NOT Verified Email

rules.name: Send_GSL_ID_NOT_Verified_Email
rules.label: Send GSL ID NOT Verified Email

decisions.name: Opportunity_Create_Follow_up_task_Sub_Flow
decisions.label: Opportunity: Create Follow up task Sub Flow

decisions.name: Opportunity_Create_Update_Investments_Sub_Flow
decisions.label: Opportunity : Create/Update Investments Sub Flow

decisions.name: Opportunity_Email_Notifications_Unit_Cert_Receipt_Issued_Sub_Flow
decisions.label: Opportunity: Email Notifications Unit Cert & Receipt Issued Sub Flow

decisions.name: Opportunity_First_investment_Sub_Flow
decisions.label: Opportunity: First investment % Sub Flow

decisions.name: Opportunity_Follow_Up_CRC_Date_Sub_Flow
decisions.label: Opportunity: Follow-Up CRC Date Sub Flow

decisions.name: Opportunity_Funds_Team_Notification_for_CSF_Investors_Limit_Sub_Flow
decisions.label: Opportunity : Funds Team Notification for CSF Investors Limit Sub Flow

rules.name: Trigger10
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 7 AND ( 4 OR 5 OR 6 )
rules.label: Trigger

decisions.name: Opportunity_Investor_update_opt_in_trigger_Sub_Flow
decisions.label: Opportunity: Investor update opt in trigger Sub Flow

decisions.name: Opportunity_Maturation_date_updated_Sub_Flow
decisions.label: Opportunity: Maturation date updated Sub Flow

decisions.name: Opportunity_Next_Step_Update_Sub_Flow
decisions.label: Opportunity - Next Step Update Sub Flow

decisions.name: Opportunity_Notify_CRC_Team_Unit_Cert_Survey_Sub_Flow
decisions.label: Opportunity: Notify CRC Team- Unit Cert Survey Sub Flow

decisions.name: Opportunity_Refund_Requested_Sub_Flow
decisions.label: Opportunity: Refund Requested Sub Flow

decisions.name: Opportunity_Subsequent_Sub_Flow
decisions.label: Opportunity: Subsequent % Sub Flow

decisions.name: Opportunity_Sync_Opp_fields_to_Investment_Sub_Flow
decisions.label: Opportunity: Sync Opp fields to Investment Sub Flow

rules.name: Trigger15
rules.conditionLogic: (1 OR 2 OR 3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6 OR 7 OR 8 OR 9 OR 10 OR 11 OR 12 OR 13 OR 14 OR 15 OR 16 OR 17 OR 18 OR 19 OR 20 OR 21 OR 22 OR 23 OR 24 OR 25 OR 26 OR 27 OR 28 OR 29) AND 30
rules.label: Trigger

decisions.name: Opportunity_Update_CM_and_CRC_Assigned_Sub_Flow
decisions.label: Opportunity: Update CM and CRC Assigned Sub Flow

decisions.name: Opportunity_Update_Investment_Status_from_Opp_Sub_Flow
decisions.label: Opportunity: Update Investment Status from Opp Sub Flow

decisions.name: Opportunity_Update_Related_Opp_Owner_PSP_Sub_Flow
decisions.label: Opportunity: Update Related Opp Owner PSP Sub Flow

decisions.name: Opportunity_VC_Property_Product_Assignment_Sub_Flow
decisions.label: Opportunity: VC/Property Product Assignment Sub Flow

decisions.name: Opportunity_VCPP_Commission_Formula_Flow_Sub_Flow
decisions.label: Opportunity : VCPP Commission Formula Flow Sub Flow

decisions.name: Opportunity_VentureCrowd_Fee_Sub_Flow
decisions.label: Opportunity: VentureCrowd Fee Sub Flow

decisions.name: Opportunity_Wholesale_Verified_Sub_Flow
decisions.label: Opportunity: Wholesale Verified Sub Flow

rules.name: Trigger18
rules.conditionLogic: (1 OR 2 OR 3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6 OR 7 OR 8 OR 9 OR 10 OR 11 OR 12) AND (13 OR 14)
rules.label: Trigger

decisions.name: Raise_Get_Opps_and_add_to_Raise_Sub_Flow
decisions.label: Raise: Get Opps and add to Raise Sub Flow

recordLookups.description: This element is used to store the product related to the triggering record into a record variable in the assignment element. By doing these we only once use a "Get" for the product record where relevant rather than using is at the start of subflows.
recordLookups.name: Get_Product
recordLookups.label: Get Product

recordLookups.description: This element is used to store the triggering record into a record variable in the assignment element. By doing these we only once use a "Get" for the triggering record rather than using is at the start of ALL subflows.
recordLookups.name: Get_Triggering_record
recordLookups.label: Get Triggering record

subflows.description: This sub flow is triggered to create a task to follow up opportunities from the CRC team.
subflows.name: Opportunity_Create_Follow_up_task_Sub_Flow1
subflows.label: Opportunity: Create Follow up task Sub Flow

subflows.description: This sub flow is triggered to either update the existing investment record related to the triggering record or create a new investment record and relate it to the triggering record if none exists.
subflows.name: Opportunity_Create_Update_Investments_Sub_Flow1
subflows.label: Opportunity : Create/Update Investments Sub Flow

subflows.description: This sub flow is triggered to send either the Receipt Issued email or Unit Cert email. Depending on which check box equals true.
subflows.name: Opportunity_Email_Notifications_Unit_Cert_Receipt_Issued_Sub_Flow1
subflows.label: Opportunity: Email Notifications Unit Cert & Receipt Issued Sub Flow

subflows.description: This sub flow is triggered to show the first investment % pulling from the related referral agreement if one exists.
subflows.name: Opportunity_First_investment_Sub_Flow1
subflows.label: Opportunity: First investment % Sub Flow

subflows.description: This sub flow is triggered to update a date field which the CR team uses to follow up an investor after their first investment.
subflows.name: Opportunity_Follow_Up_CRC_Date_Sub_Flow1
subflows.label: Opportunity: Follow-Up CRC Date Sub Flow

subflows.description: This sub flow is triggered to notify the funds management team via email if a CSF/Retail investor is attempting to invest above their limit. (more than 10K in 1 year of their first investment)
subflows.name: Opportunity_Funds_Team_Notification_for_CSF_Investors_Limit_Sub_Flow1
subflows.label: Opportunity : Funds Team Notification for CSF Investors Limit Sub Flow

subflows.description: This sub flow is triggered to opt the related person account to the triggering opportunity into investor updates if they have at least 1 closed won opporutnity.
subflows.name: Opportunity_Investor_update_opt_in_trigger_Sub_Flow1
subflows.label: Opportunity: Investor update opt in trigger Sub Flow

subflows.description: This sub flow is triggered to send an email to the investor that their maturation date has been updated if the maturation updated checkbox equals true.
subflows.name: Opportunity_Maturation_date_updated_Sub_Flow1
subflows.label: Opportunity: Maturation date updated Sub Flow

subflows.description: This sub flow is triggered to update the next step history field with the previous comments from the next step field so the history is not lost.
subflows.name: Opportunity_Next_Step_Update_Sub_Flow1
subflows.label: Opportunity - Next Step Update Sub Flow

subflows.description: This sub flow is triggered to email the CRC team when a new survey for the unit cert survey is answered.
subflows.name: Opportunity_Notify_CRC_Team_Unit_Cert_Survey_Sub_Flow1
subflows.label: Opportunity: Notify CRC Team- Unit Cert Survey Sub Flow

subflows.description: This sub flow is triggered to send an internal email to Funds Management when the investor has requested a refund.
subflows.name: Opportunity_Refund_Requested_Sub_Flow1
subflows.label: Opportunity: Refund Requested Sub Flow

subflows.description: This sub flow is triggered to update the subsequent % field from the related referral agreement if there is one and the investor has referred multiple investors.
subflows.name: Opportunity_Subsequent_Sub_Flow1
subflows.label: Opportunity: Subsequent % Sub Flow

subflows.description: This sub flow is triggered to updates certain fields in the related investment record when specificfieldsd on the triggering record are updated.
subflows.name: Opportunity_Sync_Opp_fields_to_Investment_Sub_Flow1
subflows.label: Opportunity: Sync Opp fields to Investment Sub Flow

subflows.description: This sub flow is triggered to update the CRC and CM assigned fields. This flow will update the user on those 2 fields to the VC Team.
subflows.name: Opportunity_Update_CM_and_CRC_Assigned_Sub_Flow1
subflows.label: Opportunity: Update CM and CRC Assigned Sub Flow

subflows.description: This sub flow is triggered to updates certain fields in the related investment record when specificfieldsd on the triggering record are updated.
subflows.name: Opportunity_Update_Investment_Status_from_Opp_Sub_Flow1
subflows.label: Opportunity: Update Investment Status from Opp Sub Flow

subflows.description: This sub flow is triggered to update the owner of the opportunity if the related product type is a PSP Product.
subflows.name: Opportunity_Update_Related_Opp_Owner_PSP_Sub_Flow1
subflows.label: Opportunity: Update Related Opp Owner PSP Sub Flow

subflows.description: This sub flow is triggered to update the CM assigned on the opportunity in a round robin style depending on if the related product type is VC or Property.
subflows.name: Opportunity_VC_Property_Product_Assignment_Sub_Flow1
subflows.label: Opportunity: VC/Property Product Assignment Sub Flow

subflows.description: This sub flow is triggered to update certain commission figure fieds on VCPP opportunities based on who the selling agency is on the record.
subflows.name: Opportunity_VCPP_Commission_Formula_Flow_Sub_Flow1
subflows.label: Opportunity : VCPP Commission Formula Flow Sub Flow

subflows.description: This sub flow is triggered to update the venturecrowd fee when the field is blank.
subflows.name: Opportunity_VentureCrowd_Fee_Sub_Flow1
subflows.label: Opportunity: VentureCrowd Fee Sub Flow

subflows.description: This sub flow is triggered to update the triggering record based on the related product type and current membership status to determine if the investor is eligable to invest in this type of product by updating fields In the "Certificate Information" section of the opportunity.
subflows.name: Opportunity_Wholesale_Verified_Sub_Flow1
subflows.label: Opportunity: Wholesale Verified Sub Flow

subflows.description: This sub flow is triggered to fill in the "Raise" field on the triggering record if there is a relevant raise related to the Product the triggering record is investing in.
subflows.name: Raise_Get_Opps_and_add_to_Raise_Sub_Flow1
subflows.label: Raise: Get Opps and add to Raise Sub Flow

subflows.name: Send_Bpay_Email_ID_NOT_Verified
subflows.label: Send Bpay Email ID NOT Verified

subflows.name: Send_Bpay_Email_ID_Verified
subflows.label: Send Bpay Email ID Verified

subflows.name: Send_CSF_Nominee_Bpay_Email
subflows.label: Send CSF Nominee Bpay Email

subflows.name: Send_CSF_Nominee_ID_NOT_Verified_Email1
subflows.label: Send CSF Nominee ID NOT Verified Email

subflows.name: Send_GSL_Bpay_Email1
subflows.label: Send GSL Bpay Email

subflows.name: Send_GSL_ID_NOT_Verified_Email1
subflows.label: Send GSL ID NOT Verified Email
